headline.main: 10 Things to Do in NYC Now

docs.snippet: Avon, Mary Kay and Estee Lauder say they have not resumed testing on animals, despite the claims of a story shared widely on social media. The companies say they ended testing on animals years ago but that products sold in China continue to underg...
docs.lead_paragraph: Avon, Mary Kay and Estee Lauder say they have not resumed testing on animals, despite the claims of a story shared widely on social media. The companies say they ended testing on animals years ago but that products sold in China continue to undergo testing by that country's government that might include the use of animals.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Companies Say They Didn't Resume Animal Tests
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Companies Say They Didn't Resume Animal Tests

docs.snippet: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and European Union foreign policy chief Federica Mogherini spoke by telephone on Friday to discuss a surge in violence in Ukraine and agreed to meet at a forthcoming event, Russia's foreign ministry said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and European Union foreign policy chief Federica Mogherini spoke by telephone on Friday to discuss a surge in violence in Ukraine and agreed to meet at a forthcoming event, Russia's foreign ministry said.

headline.main: Russia's Lavrov, EU's Mogherini Discuss Ukraine by Phone, Agree to Meet
